skills.name: FUSION
desc: • Deals 5 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Lower ATK and DEF.
• Damage dealt increases based on the enemy’s MAX HP.

skills.name: PERFECT HEALER
desc: • Deals 5 hits of magic damage to all enemies.
• 35% Chance for each ally to gain Perfect Hit for 2 turns.

skills.name: INHIBIT
desc: Grants Immunity to Stat Decreasing effects for all allies, which includes: ATK, MAGIC, DEF, MR, POWER, and FURY Decreasing effects.
